attributes.action: Removal of Political Correctness from Public Institutions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition proposes that a minister be appointed to remove all forms of Political Correctness from Civil and Public life. In real terms this will mean the British Government will only recognise the native British, Welsh and Scottish cultures, and their associated sub cultures.  

Translation services and interpreting services within local government, police and the National Health to be stopped. And any form of positive discrimination will be made illegal under the 1976 Race Relations act.

The ministers duties will also ensure that the national statistics office identifies and makes public the effect on the economy and crime of all identified ethnic groups with the country.
